scripts.test: npm run clean && mocha ./test/specs/*/*/*/*/*.spec.js --timeout 30000 --reporter mochawesome --require mochawesome/register --reporter-options code=false,reportDir=./reports/,reportFilename=API_Test_Report,reportPageTitle=API_Execution_Report,reportTitle=Execution_Report,charts=true,cdn=true --exit
